name: Ceramic Improvement Proposals (CIP)
summary: Establishes the process for Ceramic Improvement Proposals (CIPs)

name: Ceramic Community Discord
summary: Establishes Discord as a platform for fast-paced conversations about the Ceramic network

name: Ceramic Ecosystem Alliance (CEA)
summary: Establishes a grassroots way for community members to organize working groups around important topics

name: Ceramic Javascript API
summary: Defines the Javascript interface for using ceramic-core or http-client

name: Doctypes
summary: Defines how to specify a doctype

name: 3ID Doctype
summary: DID method native to Ceramic

name: Account Link Doctype
summary: Document that proves ownership over a crypto account

name: Tile Doctype
summary: Document that stores JSON objects

name: String Map
summary: Document that stores mappings from string to string

name: DocId Map
summary: Document that stores mappings from string to Ceramic DocId

name: Identity Index Protocol (IIP)
summary: Standard for indexing a DID's resources

name: Root Index
summary: Root directory for a DID's resources

name: Profiles Index
summary: Index of a DID's profiles

name: Accounts Index
summary: Index of directories for a DID's linked accounts

name: Keychains Index
summary: Index of a DID's keychains

name: Collections Index
summary: Index of a DID's data collections

name: Services Index
summary: Index of a DID's services

name: Connections Index
summary: Index of directories for a DID's connections

name: Basic Profile
summary: Document for storing a DID's basic profile information

name: Crypto Accounts Directory
summary: Stores a list of a DID's crypto accounts and links to proofs

name: Oauth Accounts Directory
summary: Stores a list of a DID's Oauth accounts and links to proofs
